original_text: In the story, the workers cut down the weeds and they burned them in the fire. When this world comes to an end, it will happen like that.
korean_text: 그런즉 가라지를 거두어 불에 사르는 것 같이 세상 끝에도 그러하리라

sentences.original_text: In the story, the workers cut down the weeds
and they burned them in the fire
When this world comes to an end
